title: Is Tristana gonna be the Queen of ADC?
body:
Tristana might fly under the radar abit because her changes was minor, but the items around her might have given her the crown?

Anyone else have that feeling aswell? Its not like I am salty because St33karn2k stomped us with his Trist in normals XD

But I think St33karn2k might be onto something. 

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/euw/22952858#matches

replies.body:
Am I the first one to notice that he was playing with a 5 man premade against you?

Also, the {{item:3087}}+{{item:3094}} synergy that he's taking advantage of is really awesome. Both share the same stacks, and both apply to the same hit at 100 stacks, meaning you get a guaranteed extra long range burst poke attack.

I dunno. I'm not liking the whole SS and RFC. It's becoming too prominent on EVERYTHING. I've had Zeds and Rengars using it and hitting people over walls and near one shotting because of the amount of damage it'd providing.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=glIYi7pe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-12T23:35:45.420+0000)
>
> Am I the first one to notice that he was playing with a 5 man premade against you?
> 
> Also, the {{item:3087}}+{{item:3094}} synergy that he's taking advantage of is really awesome. Both share the same stacks, and both apply to the same hit at 100 stacks, meaning you get a guaranteed extra long range burst poke attack.

premade versus premade 

We actually faced them twice. 1 where I was Zac(total stomp)  and 1 where I was graves(the trist solo carried his team) XD

And yeah, i saw the burst shots because she had both those items and since she was trist she would always get the first hit cuz of her range.
Which was amazing. 

I will admit we were outplayed by him, but I wanted to see if people had more opinions about trist.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=glIYi7pe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-12T23:35:45.420+0000)
>
> Am I the first one to notice that he was playing with a 5 man premade against you?
> 
> Also, the {{item:3087}}+{{item:3094}} synergy that he's taking advantage of is really awesome. Both share the same stacks, and both apply to the same hit at 100 stacks, meaning you get a guaranteed extra long range burst poke attack.

how much would 8% ms give us, sounds like we could replace greaves with this.
